page.title: 09Parkfield House
page.content: Parkfield House is a{historic building which was used for the{filming}of"The Country Diary of an Edwardian Lady". About ten years ago the book with this title,taken from an illustrated diary written by Edith Holden at the beginning of this century,was shown as a weekly serial on B.B.C{Televison. The scenes in the{Warwickshire countryside were filmed on location at Parkfield House,Dorridge.Miss Holden herself was a Warwickshire lady,but died in Kew Gardens,London,as a result of a drowning accident.
